item.title: Dart RegExp by Examples
item.description: In this Dart tutorial, we learn how to use RegExp class to match Strings using regular expressions. How to use firstMatch() method In the following example Dart program we use the firstMatch() method to search the first match of the regular expression in the given String. The return RegExpMatch object can be used to get the substring that matches by start and end properties. void main() { RegExp regExp = new RegExp(r"(\w+)"); String sampleString = "Dart programming language tutorials.
